content: royal rrrrooooyyyyaaaallll crochet pattern for a crown size circumference about 46 cm or 18 inches materials yarn light sport weight cotton or cotton blend such as premier yarns cotton fair 52 % cotton 48 % acrylic optional metallic embroidery thread held together with the yarn such as dmc metallic embroidery thread color light silver hook 3 5 mm other stiffening media such as mod podge stiffy starch spray or sugar solution bling to taste e g glass or plastic beads size 10 or larger e g 16 clear and 8 colored beads abbreviations chain chain stitch sl slip_stitch single_crochet single_crochet double_crochet double_crochet tc treble_crochet gauge make a gauge swatch by crocheting rounds 1-5 below over 13 stitches do not join in the round one repeat 12 s will be about 5 8 cm or 2 ¼ inches wide instructions round 1 chain 96s join in the round with sl you can adjust size by adding or subtracting multiples of 12 stitches round 2 chain 3s double_crochet 1 in each of the next 95 chain stitches of the previous round join with sl round 3 repeat round 2 © 2015 lotta kiuru-ribar page 1 of 2 all rights reserved royal round 4 chain 5s *skip 2 double_crochet 1 in the third stitch of the previous round chain 2s* repeat *-* all the way around join with single_crochet to the 3rd stitch of the initial chain 5s round 5 *double_crochet 5 into the next double_crochet of the previous round single_crochet into the second double_crochet of the previous round* repeat *-* all the way around round 6 sl3 end up at the center top of the first cluster *chain 7s single_crochet to the center of the next cluster of the previous round* repeat *-* all the way around if using beads after you pull the single_crochet loop through the center stitch of the cluster thread a bead over the metallic thread loop place the loop back on the hook and continue to crochet as usual total 16 beads on this round round 7 sl3 end up at the center top of the first arch *chain 4s tc into the center of the next arch chain 7s tc into the same center stitch chain 4s single_crochet to the center of the next arch* repeat *-* all the way around if using beads after you pull the single_crochet loop through the center stitch of the arch thread a bead over the metallic thread loop continue to crochet as usual total 8 beads on this round round 8 *single_crochet 4s sl1 at the top of the tc of the previous round single_crochet 4s into the leg of the last single_crochet stitch **chain 3s sl1 chain 5s sl1 chain 3s sl1** single_crochet 3s sl1 at the top of the tc of the previous round
